title: Columbia's New “Antisemitism Task Force” Won't Say What It Thinks Anti-Semitism Is
description:
As the task force shuts down dissent, students and faculty fear loose definitions of antisemitism will be used to stifle pro-Palestine speech.

The post Columbia’s New “Antisemitism Task Force” Won’t Say What It Thinks Anti-Semitism Is appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Who Could Have Predicted the U.S. War in Somalia Would Fail? The Pentagon.
description:
A 2007 Defense Department study found glaring problems with America’s Horn of Africa campaign plan. The U.S. military plunged ahead anyway.

The post Who Could Have Predicted the U.S. War in Somalia Would Fail? The Pentagon. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Will Aaron Bushnell’s Death Trigger Anarchism Witch Hunt?
description:
Sen. Tom Cotton demands the Pentagon root out leftist extremism.

The post Will Aaron Bushnell’s Death Trigger Anarchism Witch Hunt? appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Desperate To Escape Gaza Carnage, Palestinians Are Forced to Pay Exorbitant Fees to Enter Egypt
description:
With almost no options for escape, people in Gaza are increasingly paying thousands of dollars to fixers connected to the Egyptian government.

The post Desperate To Escape Gaza Carnage, Palestinians Are Forced to Pay Exorbitant Fees to Enter Egypt appeared first on The Intercept.
